name: Maze& position
description:
Welcome to the Maze experiment! 

In this experiment, you will walk through TWO mazes, with one in first-person point of view and the other in third-person view. In both mazes, use ↑↓←→ to navigate through the maze. Your goal is to locate the single glowing object in each maze. Once you have found the glowing object, you win the game. In order for your data to be useful, it is very important that you try your best in both mazes to find the glowing object and finish both mazes. 

Please stay in fullscreen mode and make sure you locate the objects and win before exiting. Press 'Enter' to begin the experiment.
